name: Croissant
instructions: Mix dough, fold with butter layers, proof, shape, bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Cinnamon Roll
instructions: Prepare dough, spread cinnamon filling, roll up, slice, bake at 350°F for 25 minutes.

name: Apple Turnover
instructions: Fill pastry squares with apple mixture, fold, seal, bake at 400°F for 18 minutes.

name: Eclair
instructions: Make choux pastry, pipe shapes, bake, fill with cream, glaze with chocolate.

name: Strudel
instructions: Roll thin dough, fill with apple mixture, roll up, bake at 375°F for 40 minutes.

name: Chocolate Danish
instructions: Wrap chocolate in pastry, brush with egg wash, bake at 375°F for 15 minutes.

name: Lemon Tart
instructions: Make tart shell, fill with lemon curd, bake at 325°F for 20 minutes.

name: Almond Croissant
instructions: Fill croissants with almond cream, top with almonds, bake at 350°F for 15 minutes.

name: Baklava
instructions: Layer phyllo with nuts and butter, bake, pour honey syrup over after baking.

name: Profiteroles
instructions: Make choux pastry, pipe and bake small balls, fill with cream, drizzle with chocolate.
